documentation.xhtml:p: Impulse relay with central + group on/off
Extended Pulse Timer( (re)starts on a pulse)
Short press => Q1 active, long press => Q2 active

content.xhtml:p: Toggle output on short pulse (0 or DimValue => Aout)

documentation.xhtml:p: Dimmer using a single input. Short pulse, toggle output. Long pulse, dim up/down
